title: A Comprehensive List of Pokemon Unbound Cheats

steps.title: Download and install VisualBoy Advance.
steps.content: Download and install VisualBoy Advance. Since Pokémon Unbound ROM hack, you will need a Game Boy Advance emulator to play Pokémon Unbound. Visualboy Advance allows you to enter Game Shark cheats, as well as Code Breaker cheats. Use the following steps to download and install Visualboy Advance : Go to https://visualboyadvance.org/download/ in a web browser. Click Download before your operating system (Windows or Mac). Click Download next to your CPU architecture type (32-bit or 64-bit). Extract the contents of the ZIP file.

steps.title: Open Visualboy Advance.
steps.content: Open Visualboy Advance. It has an icon that resembles a Game Boy Advance. Click the Visualboy Advance file you extracted from the ZIP file. If Windows flags Visualboy Advance as a potentially harmful file, click More Info and click Run anyway . It's not a harmful file.

steps.title: Download Pokémon Unbound.
steps.content: Download Pokémon Unbound. If you haven't already downloaded use the following steps to do so. Go to https://www.pokeharbor.com/2022/08/pokemon-unbound/ in a web browser. Scroll down and click Unbound below "Download." Click the blue Download button next to "Pokémon Unbound" (watch out for pop-up ads). Extract the contents of the ZIP file.

steps.title: Load Pokémon Unbound.
steps.content: Load Pokémon Unbound. Use the following steps to load Pokémon Unbound: Click File. Click Open . Select the Pokémon Unbound ".gba" file. Click Open .

steps.title: Open the Cheats menu.
steps.content: Open the Cheats menu. You can open the Game Shark menu for Game Shark codes, or the Code Breaker menu for Code Breaker codes. Use the following steps to open the Cheats menu. Click Tools . Click Cheats . Click List Cheats . Click the icon that resembles a green bookmark (Add cheat). Enter a description for the cheat at the top. Select "Gameshark Advance cheat" or "Codebreaker Advance cheat" below type. Enter the cheat code in the "Codes" box. Click Ok .

steps.title: These codes give you Mega Items.
steps.content: These codes give you Mega Items. Make sure you complete the Mega Evolution from Tarmigan Mansion before you enter these codes, or your Pokémon will not Mega Evolve. Enter the master code first, and then enter the specific item code separately. The item will then be available at any Poké Mart. Master Code: 0000 14D1 000A Mega Ring: 8200 3884 0161 Mega Earing: 8200 3884 020F Mega Charm: 8200 3884 0210 Mega Cuff: 8200 3884 0077 Mega Bracelet: 8200 3884 0211

steps.title: These codes give you Mega Evolution stones.
steps.content: These codes give you Mega Evolution stones. Make sure you complete the Mega Evolution from Tarmigan Mansion before you enter these codes, or your Pokémon will not Mega Evolve. Enter the master code first, and then enter Mega Stone code separately. Change "XXXX" to the 4-digit code of the Pokémon you want to Mega Evolve. Master Code: 0000 14D1 000A Mega Stone Code: 8200 3884 XXXX Abomasite: 01E9 Absolite: 01E0 Aerodactylite: 01CA Aggronite: 01D9 Alakazite: 01C4 Altarianite: 01DE Ampharosite: 01CD Audinite: 01EB Banettite: 01DF Beedrillite: 01C2 Blastoisinite: 01C1 Blazikenite: 01D4 Cameruptite: 01DD Charizardite X: 01BF Charizardite Y: 01C0 Diancite: 01EC Galladite: 01EA Garchompite: 01E7 Gardevoirite: 01D6 Gengarite: 01C6 Glalitite: 01E1 Gyaradosite: 01C9 Heracronite: 01D0 Houndoominite: 01D1 Kangaskhite: 01C7 Latiasite: 01E4 Latiosite: 01E5 Lopunnite: 01E6 Lucarionite: 01E8 Manectite: 01DB Mawilite: 01D8 Medichamite: 01DA Metagrossite: 01E3 Mewtwonite X: 01CB Mewtwonite Y: 01CC Pidgeotite: 01C3 Pinsirite: 01C8 Sablenite: 01D7 Salamencite: 01E2 Sceptilite: 01D3 Scizorite: 01CF Sharpedonite: 01DC Slowbronite: 01C5 Steelixite: 01CE Swampertite: 01D5 Tyranitarite: 01D2 Venusaurite: 01BE

steps.title: Unlock all 8 Gym Badges.
steps.content: Unlock all 8 Gym Badges. Use the following code to unlock all 8 Gym Badges: EFCE867D 5403D40D

steps.title: One-hit kill.
steps.content: One-hit kill. Use the following codes to knock out enemy Pokémon with any move: 95EDFBBA A5A72A78 C833D1A0 02FA7205

steps.title: Max out all Pokémon stats.
steps.content: Max out all Pokémon stats. Place the Pokémon you want to max out in your party. Then enter one of the following codes that corresponds to where that Pokémon is situated in your party. Then you will need to enter the code: " 0000 0007 0002 ". Enter this code second, along with one of the following codes first: 1st Pokémon: 420242DA03E7 2nd Pokémon: 420242DA03E7 3rd Pokémon: 420243A203E7 4th Pokémon: 4202440603E7 5th Pokémon: 4202446A03E7

steps.title: 100% catch rate.
steps.content: 100% catch rate. The following codes will grant you a 100% success rate when catching wild Pokémon, regardless of what Poké Ball you use: 87ACF659 707466DC 8BB602F7 8CEB681A

steps.title: Catch enemy trainer's Pokémon.
steps.content: Catch enemy trainer's Pokémon. Use the following codes to catch an enemy trainer's Pokémon. Then press L + R before throwing the Poké Ball: 4D83B1BF E0F5F507 8E883EFF 92E9660D B6C5368A 08BE8FF4 90B4977C C0151DC2

steps.title: Poké Mart items only cost 1; Use the following codes to reduce all Poké Mart items to 1:
steps.content: Poké Mart items only cost 1; Use the following codes to reduce all Poké Mart items to 1: 3C25A344 FD8F451C AD86124F 2823D8DA

steps.title: Unlimited PP.
steps.content: Unlimited PP. Enter the following codes to grant your Pokémon unlimited PP: 42023C08 6363 00000002 0002

steps.title: Unlimited EXP (Code Breaker).
steps.content: Unlimited EXP (Code Breaker). For these codes, you will need to select Code Breaker in the cheat menu instead of "Game Shark." Enter the master codes first. Then enter the EXP code. You will gain unlimited EXP when you defeat a Pokémon: The Codes are as follows: Master Code: 0000295F000A 101DC9D40007 830050000000 830050020000 EXP Code: 74000130027D 7300218C0001 82023D501388

steps.title: Unlimited Money.
steps.content: Unlimited Money. Use the following code to have unlimited money: Pair these codes with one of the items available at Poké Mart cheats to get unlimited items: Game Shark: 29C78059 96542194 Code Breaker 1: 820257BC 423F Code Breaker 2: 820257BE 000F

steps.title: Master code.
steps.content: Master code. Enter the code " 82003884 XXXX " and replace "XXXX" with the 4-digit code for the item you want. The item will be available at a Poké Mart.

steps.title: Master Balls.
steps.content: Master Balls. Enter one of the following codes to make Master Balls available as the first item at a Poké Mart: B9A1AACB D6F4419A or 82003884 0001

steps.title: Healing items.
steps.content: Healing items. The 4-digit codes for healing items are as follows: Potion: 000D Super Potion: 0016 Hyper Potion: 0015 Max Potion: 0014 Antidote: 000E Burn Heal: 000F Ice Heal: 0010 Parlyz Heal: 0012 Full Heal: 0017 Awakening: 0011 Full Restore: 0013 Revive: 0018 Max Revive: 0019 =

steps.title: Poké Balls.
steps.content: Poké Balls. The 4-digit codes for Poké Balls are as follows. Safari Ball: 0005 Net Ball: 0006 Dive Ball: 0007 Nest Ball: 0008 Repeat Ball: 0009 Timer Ball: 000A Luxury Ball: 000B Premier Ball: 000C

steps.title: HM Items.
steps.content: HM Items. The 4-digit codes for HM items are as follows: HM01: 0153 HM02: 0154 HM03: 0155 HM04: 0156 HM05: 0157 HM06: 0158 HM07: 0159 HM08: 015A

steps.title: Evolution items.
steps.content: Evolution items. You will need to enter a separate master code for evolution items first. That code is: " 000014D1 000A " Then you will need to enter the master code for all items and the 4-digit code for the Evolution item you want. The 4-digit codes are as follows: Black Sludge: 003A Catching Charm: 0173 Dawn Stone: 0064 Dusk Stone: 0063 Fire Stone: 005F Flame Orb: 0039 Gigantamax Powder: 003B Honey: 0048 Ice Stone: 0069 Leaf Stone: 0062 Life Orb: 0037 Light Clay: 005A Link Stone: 005B Magma Stone: 005C Moon Stone: 005E Oval Charm: 0278 Oval Stone: 0066 Shiny Charm: 0279 Shiny Stone: 0065 Sun Stone: 8005D Thunder Stone: 0060 Toxic Orb: 0038 Water Stone: 0061

steps.content: Pokémon Modifier Codes. Enter the master code first. Then enter the specific code for the attribute you want a wild Pokémon you want to capture. The codes are as follows: Master Code: AA3BB0ED 41CD5D95 Adamant: 5EB8DEEE 692ED298 Bashful: B05B4CCD A0A1505B Bold: 35EB915F 08F33974 Brave: E485844D 2F24038C Calm: 31F62F82 D9A0C100 Careful: 1A15BF1E E72650E4 Docile: A58F6F1B BFB13FEF Gentle: 9A41D845 41B93FE6 Hardy: D0E34D66 5796A7D3 Hasty: D4950A99 D729D80A Jolly: E9EC2CBF A7EDD4A7 Impish: CDA2AB99 F89D5BB9 Lax: D593BF29 E18AAAE5 Lonely: D73BC50A 5F47AA0E Mild: A2461E51 304137B6 Modest: E1EB2109 4480C28D Naive: 56F744B0 37E16732 Naughty: 83286B46 6479AA98 Quiet: 0456554B 66D3AAF9 Quirky: 5A7B2626 21ECD183 Rash: 909149AB 2DE8726A Relaxed: 34027F23 7E7E1599 Sassy: D47DA721 6C3B9FFC Serious: 93F04759 F95753D9 Timid: 1BC372C9 06B4D17F

steps.title: Gender modifiers.
steps.content: Gender modifiers. Enter one of the following codes for the wild Pokémon gender you want to capture: Female: EB34F751 A96B854D 78DA95DF 44018CB4 Male: EB34F751 A96B854D 141BB87C 83D7018F

steps.title: Shiny Pokémon.
steps.content: Shiny Pokémon. Enter one of the following codes to encounter a shiny Pokémon. It is recommended that you pair this with another modifier. However, this code will override the gender modifier code. In newer versions of Pokémon Unbound, the shiny will not appear until it is captured. You may also need to take it to Name Changer before being able to use it. Enter the following codes to encounter a shiny Pokémon: [1] X Research source 1670047D 04815C68 18452A7D DDE55BCC
